channel.title: How do i remove pk point and donor point system?
channel.description:
hey, the server what im coding has these "Pk point and donor point" system so you cant buy a item if you dont have enough pk or donor points.... and i dont really like themm..... i want that players can buy everything they want if they just have the money.
SO please help i know im a nooooooooob :o

item.title: How do i remove pk point and donor point system?
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

most sources that usually come with a pk point system and a donor system are usually some sort of PI base. :s not saying it is but just an assumption

Read full topic
